    • Constructor Detail

      • Mqtt

        public Mqtt(MqttConnection mqttConnection,
            IotHubListener listener,
            MqttMessageListener messageListener,
            String connectionId,
            Map<Integer,Message> unacknowledgedSentMessages)
     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor to instantiate mqtt broker connection.
        Parameters:
        mqttConnection - the connection to use
        listener - the listener to be called back upon connection established/lost and upon a message being delivered
        messageListener - the listener to be called back upon a message arriving
        connectionId - the id of the connection
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided mqttConnection is null

                throws TransportException

        Throws:

        Method to disconnect to mqtt broker connection.

      • publish

        protected void publish(String publishTopic,
                       Message message)
                throws TransportException
        Method to publish to mqtt broker connection.
        Parameters:
        publishTopic - the topic to publish on mqtt broker connection.
        message - the message to publish.
        Throws:
        TransportException - if sas token has expired, if connection hasn't been established yet, or if Paho throws for any other reason

      • subscribe

        protected void subscribe(String topic)
                  throws TransportException
        Method to subscribe to mqtt broker connection.
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to subscribe on mqtt broker connection.
        Throws:
        TransportException - if failed to subscribe the mqtt topic.
        IllegalArgumentException - if topic is null

                               throws TransportException
        Method to receive messages on mqtt broker connection.
        Returns:
        a received message. It can be null
        Throws:
        TransportException - if failed to receive mqtt message.

      • peekMessage

        public org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,byte[]> peekMessage()

      • sendMessageAcknowledgement

        protected boolean sendMessageAcknowledgement(int messageId)
                                      throws TransportException
        Attempts to send ack for the provided message. If the message does not have a saved messageId in this layer, this function shall return false.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message id to send the ack for
        Returns:
        true if the ack is sent successfully or false if the message isn't tied to this mqtt client
        Throws:
        TransportException - if an exception occurs when sending the ack
